ygData.subject: ack!
ygData.msgSnippet: NO LIFETAP! i ve been ragging on this forever, people keep saying we should have lifetaps, and i have to keep saying no :) either they would be too
ygData.messageBody:
NO LIFETAP! i've been ragging on this forever, people keep saying we should
have lifetaps, and i have to keep saying no :) either they would be too
underpowered for us and be a total waste of space, or they'd be too powerful
and make us one step closer to being a god class. we aren't playing UO folks
:) while something like that would be NICE, we sure as heck do not NEED it.
anyway i'd take a long-term DOT via the pet over a lifetap for 20 or 30 any
day. you DO realize how slow those spells cast? :)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
leveling even slower than bathory! :) but intentionally..
